title: Moto9999
author: Moto9999
content: I need a loan worth $500 any crypto is acceptable I don't plan on paying back with interest I need it for a week anyone interested should let me know I don't have collateral but I do have insurance

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Quote from: Moto9999 on March 18, 2023, 04:48:17 PMI don't plan on paying backLol. At least you're not sugarcoating it.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: Moto9999 on March 18, 2023, 04:48:17 PMany crypto is acceptablehttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5221415.msg61917787#msg61917787

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: But 6 days ago you had 0.3 BTC (8,433 USD as of now) in your account and you wanted some Ether. What happened? Did you blow all of it off in 6 days and now need a $500 loan?Does this mean our deal is dead?

comments.author: Maxre
comments.body: Quote from: Moto9999 on March 18, 2023, 04:48:17 PMI need a loan worth $500 any crypto is acceptable I don't plan on paying back with interest I need it for a week anyone interested should let me know I don't have collateral but I do have insurance Brother you won't get any kind of loan because you got a negative rating and I do not know what have you done and I will also won't check what happened to you. Crypto loan is granted to those who have some kind of collateral in case they flee away. And as you know that Crypto is a decentralized and when someone gets money than they can flee away. AndAlso I don't know that why people always try to get loan and that is useless because you also have eto cover some interest too.
